title: Tuscan Tuna and Bean Salad
introduction: Tuscan Tuna and Bean Salad showcases the region's mastery of cooking beans to perfection. The creamy, flavorful beans uplift this classic salad, and when combined with the rich texture of tuna belly canned in olive oil, it becomes a truly special dish. This refreshing, protein-packed salad is perfect for a light meal or a sophisticated appetizer.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 cups cooked or canned cannellini beans, drained
1 small red onion, very thinly sliced
2 (7-ounce) cans Italian tuna packed in olive oil
2 or 3 Belgian endive, trimmed and separated into spears
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together the oil, lemon juice, and salt to taste and a generous grinding of pepper.
Add the beans, celery, onion, and tuna. Stir well.
Arrange the endive spears on a platter. Top with the salad. Serve immediately.
